title: ICE: 'index out of bounds: the len is 8 but the index is 8', compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/error_reporting/nice_region_error/util.rs:61:22

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:

detailed explanations: E0412, E0658. For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0412`. ```
